entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is sleeping in a tent.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: A person who wakes Harry up and tells him to grab a jacket and get outside quickly.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who is at his heels as they leave the tent.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley wakes Harry up and tells him to grab a jacket and get outside quickly.
Harry and Ron leave the tent together, with Ron following closely behind Harry.
